name: @aloshy-ai/fresh-ai-wallpapers-api
description: Supabase Edge Function serving almost guaranteed fresh images from CivitAI

scripts.db:test: yarn db:start && npx supabase db test
scripts.edge:start: yarn db:start && nohup npx supabase functions serve > logs/nohup.out 2>&1 &
scripts.edge:status: echo 'Edge Runtime Status:' && (npx supabase status | grep 'edge_runtime') || echo 'Edge Functions are not running'
scripts.edge:stop: pkill -f 'supabase functions serve' || echo 'No edge functions running'
